document.full_text: three of osama bin laden's wives, who survived the american raid on his compound in abbottabad, pakistan, and are now in pakistan's custody, were reportedly "hostile" when they spoke to united states intelligence officials.
document.title: the lede: u.s. interrogated 'hostile' bin laden wives
lines_and_colors: three of osama bin laden's wives, who survived the american raid on his compound in abbottabad, pakistan, and are now in pakistan's custody, were reportedly "hostile" when they spoke to united states intelligence officials.
